explains: n. 兄弟关系；手足情谊；四海之内皆兄弟的信念
wordGroup: muslim brotherhood 穆斯林兄弟会；穆斯林联盟；回教兄弟会

sentences.en: People threw flowers into the river between the two countries as a symbolic act of brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 人们把花扔进两国之间的河里，以此作为兄弟情谊的象征性的行为。

sentences.en: They live and work together in complete equality and brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 他们完全平等和兄弟般地在一起生活和工作。
